Our platform allows: Our platform allows users to compare air quality between different locations. This feature helps identify areas with critical pollution levels and promotes awareness about the differences in air quality across regions
We provide detailed: We provide detailed historical data analysis, allowing users to track air quality trends over time. This helps understand the impact of different factors on air quality and supports informed decision-making for public health and environmental policies
We keep our users: We keep our users informed with timely alerts and notifications about significant changes in air quality. Our notifications include warnings and health advisories to help users take necessary precautions
Our application offers: Our application offers real-time air quality data across various locations in Sri Lanka. We use advanced sensors and technology to measure key air pollutants such as PM2.5, PM10, O3, CO, NO2, SO2, and CO2, providing a comprehensive view of the air quality index (AQI)
We are a team of passionate: We are a team of passionate professionals, including environmental scientists, engineers, and software developers, committed to providing reliable air quality monitoring solutions. With years of experience in environmental technology and data analysis, we aim to bring transparency and awareness to air pollution issues.
Our mission is to empower: Our mission is to empower communities with affordable and eco-friendly information about air quality. We are dedicated to helping people make informed decisions to protect their health and well-being
We envision a future: We envision a future where everyone has access to accurate and actionable air quality information.By raising awareness and providing opportunities, we aim to contribute to cleaner air and healthier lives for all.
